description: Borrowed from Russian пиро́г (piróg). Doublet of pierog/pieróg. For the plurals ending in n, see Yiddish פּיראָג‎ (pirog).

nouns.description: pirog (plural pirogs or pirogi or pirogen or pirogn)

entries.meaning: A baked case of dough with a sweet or savoury filling, popular in Eastern Europe.
